EFM8 Bootloader
===============

Talks to the factory Bootloader on EFM8 to flash firmware.
The protocol is documented in AN945_.

.. _AN945: https://www.silabs.com/documents/public/application-notes/AN945.pdf

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   install
   efm8
   efm8_read
   u2fzero
